channel.title: Lawl ddosing rscheata.net
channel.description:
Over 500 ips are now hitting my box. I have spent already 5 hours blocking attacks.
wait ill let the site go up wat? wat? wat ? rsca you ddos? yeh
none of the IRC Staff has taken any action.
(frank_) so what, it has nothing to do with me
(17:00:38) •••———————————————————••• (17:00:38) ••• Query with lawl/ opened on Sunday, July 6th 2008, 17:00:38. (17:00:38) ••• Total queries: 64/~0.4 per day (17:00:38) ••• Queries today: 4 (17:00:38) •••———————————————————••• (17:00:38) (lawl) wat] (17:00:45) (ruler) stop (17:03:32) (lawl) que (17:03:56) (ruler) please (17:04:03) (lawl) well (17:04:07) (lawl) why should i (17:04:31) (ruler) why should you not (17:04:56) -> •••Frank_••• you supporting lawl? (17:04:58) (lawl) bcuz (17:05:04) (lawl) your site promotes excessive amounts of stupidity (17:05:17) (lawl) looks like its runnning fine anyway (17:05:31) (lawl) this whole 'clog' thing (17:05:42) (lawl) is really pathetic (17:05:50) (lawl) whos idea was it anyway
ruler is trying to convince me to not attack him but my years of irc are preventing me from making proper sentences
[quote] (17:13:38) (lawl) cant see it (17:13:43) (lawl) anyways, everyone supports me doing it [/quote[

item.title: Lawl ddosing rscheata.net
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:31, topic:217923”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=286387.msg2320191#msg2320191 date=1215471812]

I’m not sure what you’re talking about. They’re prank calling Jagex?

They gave out Jagex’s private number so people could abuse it and basically force them to get a new number.

Essentially the same as a ddos, no?
[/quote]
Private as in not listed on runescape.com yes.

Just incase no one else is aware of it, in the UK 0870 numbers are part of a group of dialing codes referred to as non-geographic numbers (Wiki link) meaning it is most likely a phone re-direction service rather than jagexs actual phone number (Google 0870, theirs thousands of the buggers). I would suspect that if people aren’t getting through then it means that jagex have already called their re-direction service provider and got the number changed

They changed it the day geno initally announced we were planning something on firday. Geno found the new number in the last minutes day of and released the number after business hours on friday.

I think some of you are just jealous geno did something no one else has done. And you backup your actions with “we are defending jagex”, yet your on a website devoted to cheating and illegal private server clients / caches. tunnel vision…

You can listen to a call here:
http://www.staticimp.com/codeNameClog.html[/quote]Are you fucking retarded? Jealous? We’re actually defending Jagex because you’re going over the line with it.

[quote=“ruler, post:49, topic:217923”][quote author=io9 link=topic=286387.msg2325634#msg2325634 date=1215674479]
TBH, I’m surprised JaGEx just doesn’t sue RSCA. Ruler, drop it, it’s your fault for being an idiot and running a shit community that uses such childish practices to get revenge for something that was their fault to begin with.

This isn’t the wild west. Nobody is going to accept vigilante justice as a reason for illegal behaviour.

It’s even worse, it’s the internet. I firmly believe that whoever is/was DDoS’ing RSCA has the full right to do so in defense of JaGEx. Heck, it could even be JaGEx clogging up his intertubes.
[/quote]
Sue me for stating a publicly listed phone number, I would enjoy that litigation.[/quote]
As far as my understanding is, you listed a phone number of Jagex’s; implying people to prank it.

Basically, what you’re saying is, is that we’re jealous of Geno because he found a publicly listed number and told people to prank it.

riiiiiiiiiight :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Lawl ddosing rscheata.net
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:45, topic:217923”][quote author=ruler link=topic=286387.msg2324298#msg2324298 date=1215634561]

Ruler, I don’t know how adept you are with server security,
but as i see you’re running a linux box with cpanel, i’d reccomend installing csf firewall from configserver.
It intregrates into whm too.

You can set rules to drop ips automatically after x amounts of requests per sec etc.
If you need any help let me know.

I see a CT_LIMIT connection limit but not a rate.

The issue is when the ddos started it was very distributed like 300+ connections with 0 to 3 connections.
[/quote]HOW DOES 300 = 0 - 3???[/quote]
At any instance some of the ips may not have a connection.

[quote=“io9, post:48, topic:217923”]TBH, I’m surprised JaGEx just doesn’t sue RSCA. Ruler, drop it, it’s your fault for being an idiot and running a shit community that uses such childish practices to get revenge for something that was their fault to begin with.

This isn’t the wild west. Nobody is going to accept vigilante justice as a reason for illegal behaviour.

It’s even worse, it’s the internet. I firmly believe that whoever is/was DDoS’ing RSCA has the full right to do so in defense of JaGEx. Heck, it could even be JaGEx clogging up his intertubes.[/quote]
Sue me for stating a publicly listed phone number, I would enjoy that litigation.

You laugh about Child Molestation?
http://209.85.165.104/search?q=cache:YEnd9WAB_foJ:www.gamesforum.ca/showthread.php%3Ft%3D304683+"Ilya+Ostrovskiy"&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=3&gl=us&client=opera

This isn’t the wild west. Nobody is going to accept vigilante justice as a reason for illegal behaviour.

item.title: Lawl ddosing rscheata.net
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:31, topic:217923”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=286387.msg2320191#msg2320191 date=1215471812]

I’m not sure what you’re talking about. They’re prank calling Jagex?

They gave out Jagex’s private number so people could abuse it and basically force them to get a new number.

Essentially the same as a ddos, no?
[/quote]
Private as in not listed on runescape.com yes.

Just incase no one else is aware of it, in the UK 0870 numbers are part of a group of dialing codes referred to as non-geographic numbers (Wiki link) meaning it is most likely a phone re-direction service rather than jagexs actual phone number (Google 0870, theirs thousands of the buggers). I would suspect that if people aren’t getting through then it means that jagex have already called their re-direction service provider and got the number changed

I think some of you are just jealous geno did something no one else has done. [/quote]
That’s no excuse for the disturbance and inappropriate behavior that you, and many other people, have done because you distributed their number.

I’m not on any sides right now, because there is no substantial evidence, but i still agree with Thug-Life; This, and your community, are communities that center around cheating. Not exploiting private information for some laughs.

Have you tried talking to lawl? Maybe PM him, find out his email, whatever, but don’t post tampered information without verifying its contents.

Read full topic

Just incase no one else is aware of it, in the UK 0870 numbers are part of a group of dialing codes referred to as non-geographic numbers (Wiki link) meaning it is most likely a phone re-direction service rather than jagexs actual phone number (Google 0870, theirs thousands of the buggers). I would suspect that if people aren't getting through then it means that jagex have already called their re-direction service provider and got the number changed

They changed it the day geno initally announced we were planning something on firday. Geno found the new number in the last minutes day of and released the number after business hours on friday.
